stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Discover Secret Charm to Soothe Body's Internal Fires!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has unearthed a marvelous secret within the human form. They found special essences, derived from bodily humors, that can calm the fierce warrior sprites causing aches and fevers. A new potent potion can boost these essences, bringing swift relief and peace to those afflicted.

stories.fantasy_headline: Arcane Smiths Forge Tiny Magic Gates for Life's Secrets!
stories.fantasy_story: Master Wizards and Arcane Smiths have forged minuscule magical portals, no wider than a few dust motes. These enchanted gateways mimic nature's own conduits, promising new ways to map the very threads of life. Such a breakthrough could also empower advanced arcane calculations and mind-mimicking artifacts.
